name: Edgar Temkin
description: My name is Edgar Temkin, a Game Designer & Product Manager with a B.Sc. in Game Design & Development from Tiltan School of Design & Visual Communication. Currently, I design and manage games at Hoppa Play, bringing engaging mechanics and immersive experiences to life. Previously, I worked at Code For Israel - Mr.Gish, leading game and product development while managing projects with Agile methodologies. My expertise includes game design, project management, and cross-team collaboration, ensuring smooth development and high-quality results. Passionate about creating compelling gameplay, I strive to innovate and push boundaries in every project.
